title: Baeru Koi Toka Shirimasen
alternative_title: 映える恋とか知りません
status: 映える恋とか知りません
description:
Description :
        Laika spends her days glamorously as a junior high school model. One day, one of her classmates, Kurose, takes a picture of her in a dorky way!When she asks her classmate to show her, she finds a video that looks like a music video or a scene from a movie...!Seeing Kurose's unassuming and inconspicuous smile and manly side, Laika realizes that her feelings for Kurose are love.And suddenly he boldly confesses that he wants her as his boyfriend...?
